metadata.title: CVE-2018-5686 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In MuPDF 1.12.0, there is an infinite loop vulnerability and applicationhang in the pdf_parse_array function (pdf/pdf-parse.c) because EOF is notconsidered. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause adenial of service via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
